description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ac0m8","text":"This protocol was designed for the workflow of the Multiome assay on 16 PBMC samples using the 10X Next GEM Single Cell Multiome ATAC + Gene Expression Kit. We adapted Jimmy Ye Lab's pooling and demultiplexing strategy, overloading cells in each well. For the demultiplexing step using this protocol, you may need genotyping information of your samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bpurd","text":"Remove cryovials from liquid nitrogen storage and place them on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f17jq","text":"Warm The medium to 37°C in a water bath and prepare the washing Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d59ch","text":"Thaw frozen vials in the water bath at 37°C for 1-2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dl55","text":"Pour the thawed cells gently into a 15 mL conical tube containing 10 mL pre-warmed Complete medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":83,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ddfb","text":"Rinse the cryovial with 1 mL pre-warmed Complete medium and add the rinse to the 15 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ase04","text":"Centrifuge at 300g for 5 min at room temperature and aspirate the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bglt6","text":"Resuspend cells with 1 mL pre-warmed Washing medium and add 9 mL more Washing medium to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4777e","text":"Incubate for 10 min at room temperature to ensure the free-floating DNA is depleted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jf0","text":"Centrifuge at 300g for 5 min at room temperature and aspirate the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ts2d","text":"Prepare samples for Cell counting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5osd2","text":"Resuspend thecell pellet in 1 mL of pre-warmed Complete medium (dropped slowly along the side of the tube) by gently tapping.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hk19","text":"Add 4 mL of pre-warmed Complete medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dotok","text":"Invert the tube gently several times to homogenize the cell suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7l6gn","text":"Take 10 uL for cell counting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekeme","text":"Add another 5 mL of pre-warmed Complete medium and centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":74,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cvan","text":"Count cells and determine viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdqqq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7t2t7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":8,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"699j9","text":"Caution:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3reqd","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3bcgt","text":"Filter the trypan blue solution with 0.45 µm filter before using each time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emqfj","text":"Count the cells by adding 10 µL of cells to 10 µL of trypan blue and pipetting up and down to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7f5o1","text":"Apply 10 uL of the mixture to the hemacytometer or cell counter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fg688","text":"Calculate the cell number.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"be905","text":"Resuspend cell pellet in 1 mL of pre-warmed Complete medium by gently tapping. Add another 9 mL of pre-warmed Complete medium. Briefly vortex (optional). Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":91,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":168,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":177,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":186,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sbmu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bamn3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dumpe","text":"Using Complete medium from now on is to wash away benzonase.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3utsf","text":"Resuspend cells in Complete medium and adjust to 1 x 106 cells per mL. Gently tap tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":20},{"style":"sup","offset":55,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9i5jg","text":"Seed cells into a 24-well plate (low attachment plate) at 1 x 106 cells per well in 1 mL Complete medium, using a wide-bore 1 mL pipet tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":64,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ogij","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2oa9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"al9t5","text":"Tips:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cfgcs","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4h2cj","text":"1. If there are more than 4 million cells per individual, seed four wells (1 million cells per well): two for the control (Ctr) and the other two for lipopolysaccharide (LPS).","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3pqc9","text":"2. Pellet, wash once with PBS, and freeze all the leftover cells at -80°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52flp","text":"Transfer the cell culture plate to the incubator (37°C, 5% CO2) for 16-24 hrs, and leave the cells for recovery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":61,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":41,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":82,"style":"bold"}],"key":"duvf5","text":"To prepare 1000 µL of 200 ng/mL LPS, add 10 µL of 20 µg/mL LPS (-80°C stock) into 990 µL Complete medium.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p0tp","text":"Preparation and check the following list before starting this section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6pn1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d23uv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5ouqd","text":"Checking List:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lhlq","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"56gne","text":"Set centrifuge for 5 mL tubes at 4°C. Prepare/label FACS tubes. ","type":"ordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7udf7","text":"Bring Dead Cell Removal beads(0.5 ml aliquot) and buffer(1 tube with 0.5 ml aliquot 20x buffer, @ 4°C) to room temperature. ","type":"ordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ol0h","text":"Bring 4% BSA(1 tube with 1ml aliquot, @ -20°C box) to room temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b6ojd","text":"Bring TrypLE Express to RT.","type":"ordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: 2. Stimulation of the PBMCs with ligands
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqmg3","text":"Add 50 µL of LPS (200ng/mL, 20x) in one well (with 1 mL medium) at a final concentration of 10 ng/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":92,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 2. Stimulation of the PBMCs with ligands
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fmjja","text":"Tap the plate 10 times (at each side of the plate) to resuspend cells and mix the medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 2. Stimulation of the PBMCs with ligands
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"98ngd","text":"Transfer the cell culture plate to the incubator (37°C, 5% CO2) for 6 hrs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c34a7","text":"Move the cell culture plate out of the incubator at the end of the incubation (6 hr after adding LPS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eqcc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c77i7","text":"  Centrifuge at 350g for 8 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"uit","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"350","duration":480,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"677ac","text":"Check cells under the microscope to see if there are any cell clusters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de1jn","text":"Transfer cells with medium into a 5 mL FACS tube using a 1 mL wide-bore pipette. Rinse the well with 1 mL PBS and add the rinse to the FACS tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t1mr","text":"Check the cell plate under a microscope to see if any cells are left over.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7itgt","text":"Add 200 µL Tryple E, incubate at 37°C for 5 min, and rinse with another 1 mL PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22dnh","text":"Pipette a few times and transfer all the cells to the FACS tubes by wide-bore pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t7jp","text":"Pour off the supernatant into the sink (usually will have 50 uL liquid leftover).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7bfi8","text":"Invert the tube and dry the tube top with a Kim wipe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"63i1u","text":"Wash cells with Staining Buffer (from BioLegend)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"df62v","text":"Add 0.5 mL Staining Buffer to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9it6k","text":"Tap on the white columns several times to resuspend cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ade7a","text":"Add another 1.5 mL Staining Buffer to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ek4oa","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dvck7","text":"Pour off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4d5vk","text":"Dry the tube top.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2vhnu","text":"Count cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnolq","text":"Add 500 µL Staining Buffer (now total volume around 550 uL). Tap on the white columns to resuspend cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jdo0","text":"Take 10 µL for Trypan Blue staining and count cells using cell counter Countess.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2da3c","text":"Calculate the cell number and volumes (will be used in step 26).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"927ik","text":"Wash cells with Staining Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fci31","text":"Add 2 mL Staining Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dlgh1","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asng6","text":"Pour off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6q24o","text":"Dry the tube top.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rape","text":"Pool cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k3bn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a26nu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fk0ud","text":"Examples:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"es250","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dlp1l","text":"we thawed PBMCs from 8 individuals, and each received 2 treatments (Ctrl, LPS); thus we had 16 cell samples; ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7kgmj","text":"We pool the Ctr and LPS treated samples into two separated tubes and label them as P1(Ctr) and P2(LPS).","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"51d4m","text":"If we do 16 individuals and we plate the samples to two groups and each group has 8 individuals and we pool samples the same as 8 individuals, but pool the other group to P3(Ctr) and P4(LPS). ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6tdq7","text":"For each cell sample, we collect as many cells as possible and pool the same amount of cells from each sample.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a47ru","text":"Place extra cells at 4°C (in case).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erq8s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a9pab","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":8,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7dbe1","text":"Caution:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"be4b3","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2vap8","text":"Total cell number after pooling should be better higher than 2 million, at least higher than 1 million; ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ja97","text":"If less than 2 million, the cell number after dead cell removal and filtration will be too low due to cell loss in each step.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"64q6f","text":"Use low-binding Eppendorf tubes for all steps below.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6gtf6","text":"Check the list below before this section:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18rhk","text":"Prepare Binding buffer (from Dead cell removal kit, 4°C), and add 0.5 mL Binding buffer into 9.5 mL distilled water. Bring to RT before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tqa9","text":"Prepare 10 mL 0.4% BSA in PBS, add 400 µL 10% BSA (-20°C aliquots) into 9.6 mL PBS (no Ca2+, no Mg2+). Keep on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":89,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":98,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mgta","text":"Prepare 10 mL 0.04% BSA in PBS, and add 1 mL 0.4% BSA into 9 mL PBS (no Ca2+, no Mg2+). {"blocks":[{"key":"fhou7","text":"Filter cells with 70 µm cell strainer using a regular 1 mL tip. Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at 4°C. Remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej43l","text":"Add 100 µL dead cell removal microbeads (well-vortexed). Resuspend by pipetting using P100 pipet. Leave at room temperature for 15 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9tdh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4cv84","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"cpih4","text":"Tips:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"484o1","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6rna1","text":"During the 15 min incubation, bring the following reagents out:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ds0h7","text":"50% Glycerol(2 aliquot tubes) from -80 °C to room temperature.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4kuen","text":"TSO (template switch oligo) from -80 °C to room temperature.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fctl1","text":"Rinse the column with 500 µL binding buffer twice. Save the flowthrough in another 1.5 mL tube and place on ice (in case more cells can be collected).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cfoms","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at 4°C and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ccjj","text":"Rinse the column with another 500 µL binding buffer. Collect the follow-through in the same tube from the last step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5dj0","text":"Transfer the cell suspension into the column and leave them to pass through. Collect the follow-through in a low-binding 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4pqsr","text":"Add 400 µL binding buffer to the pooled cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1jo1","text":"During the last 1 min, rinse the MS column with 500 µL binding buffer (room temperature). Keep the MS column wet all the time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dck0","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet with 1 mL 0.4% BSA in PBS, slowly pipette using a wide-bore tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acp8c","text":"Centrifuge at 300g for 10min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gvva","text":"Calculate each pool's total cell number and ensure each pool has around 1M cells (this is 10x Genomics suggestion).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":72,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epg4b","text":"Take 10 µL for Trypan Blue staining and count cells using cell counter Countess, record cell viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7rhe","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet with 1000 µL 0.04% BSA in PBS. Pass through the 40 µm Flowmi Cell Strainer using P1000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2suln","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min at 4°C. Use a pipet to remove SPN.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgbfl","text":"Remove ALL the supernatant without disrupting the cell pellet and put cells ON ICE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":76,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajk7o","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"arb9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3muou","text":"CRITICAL STEP:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lvui","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4e1en","text":"Get rid of all the supernatant.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"br65i","text":"Make sure to avoid the visible cell pellet when pipetting. Optimal removal of supernatant and minimal disruption of the cell pellet is attained when the final 100 µl is removed in a consistent and fluid motion without starting and stopping.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4ilqe","text":"Two pipetting steps:","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ff7vo","text":"\t1. Aspirate down to 100 µl with a p1000 pipette.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"99lhe","text":"\t2. Then, remove the final 100 µl with a p200 pipette.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: 5. Neutrophils depletion(Optional, CD66abce MicroBead Kit, human)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dkr07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dl4f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jn8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6udq9","text":"Attention:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fv8db","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4i58v","text":"There is no need for the overnight recovered PBMCs since most of the neutrophils will be broken.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d5ge7","text":"Kit: CD66abce MicroBead Kit","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bidfb","text":"\t- Miltenyi Biotec: Order no. 130-092-393","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d2oe7","text":" Column:","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3dp5","text":" \t- Miltenyi Biotec: MS(Order no. 130-042-201)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71m4v","text":"Resuspend nuclei pellet with 1000 µl chilled Wash Buffer(WSB) and pipette 5 times to mix for a total of 3 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":24},{"style":"bold","offset":74,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":104,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b187t","text":"Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o04l","text":"Resuspend nuclei pellet with 1000 µl chilled Wash Buffer(WSB) and pipette 5 times to mix. There is no need for an interval timer for washing.(If the volume is more than 1.5 ml, transfer the nuclei to a 2-ml microcentrifuge tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":24},{"style":"bold","offset":74,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"br17e","text":"Remove the supernatant without disrupting the nuclei pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aam4h","text":"Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mit7","text":"Add 500 µL chilled Wash Buffer(WSB) for every 1 million cells to the lysed cells. Invert the tube 5 times to mix. You need to scale up or down the volume of the lysis Buffer based on the cell numbers of each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s044","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7crj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7cegd","text":"Tips:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6q6qg","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":13,"style":"bold"}],"key":"444f7","text":"Use the same interval timer used in the lysis step(Step 45) for this step.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6da5t","text":"Add 500 µl of WSB for every 1 M cells.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lrjg","text":"Take 2μL of nuclei suspension for counting, and record counts in the attached template.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24su5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97qaj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4i80p","text":"Critical：","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4mdgp","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fiu6p","text":"Prepare sample slides one by one for counting because the nuclei will be broken in Trypan blue buffer for a short time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5ej7","text":"Resuspend pooled nuclei in ~50μL chilled Diluted Nuclei Buffer (DNB) to reach the target 15M/ml concentration. Maintain on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":27},{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80tgp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfbk5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5avp1","text":"Critical：","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2n981","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"76sn1","text":"The resuspension in Diluted Nuclei Buffer is critical for optimal Single Cell ATAC assay performance.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dfnap","text":"Remove ALL supernatant, taking care not to disturb the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3aqb9","text":"Pass nuclei suspension through a 40 µm Flowmi Cell Strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lu01","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4m9o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3icim","text":"Attention:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fij3i","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"49qg6","text":"1. The Dead volume of Flowmi is around 20 to 30 µL(for 50µl to 1000µl in total).","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2m9o3","text":"Proceed immediately to Chromium Next GEM Single Cell Multiome ATAC + Gene Expression User Guide(CG000338).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v6lh","text":"If observe a clump of nuclei, filter through a 40μm strainer and count again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
